questStart: Hello! My name is Sam, I hope you can help me with something. I found a cake recepie in my granmother's house and I want to make it for her birthday. I want to surprise her!
Can you pick it for me?
questInProgress: Hi friend! I need 1 banana for the cake. We can make it together! Is going to be delicious!
questFinished: Oh! Thank you! You are amazing! Now we can start making the cake together! My grandmother is going to be very happy!
hints: Hello! I can give you a clue, what you need is yellow.
